about_the_game:
Throwables

At the start of each match, every player is randomly assigned a single throwable. These throwables vary from a fiery molotov cocktail to Thor's hammer or a simple stone. But the true chaos doesn't end there—throughout the course of the match, five additional random throwables will spawn, scattered across the arena, each one offering fresh opportunities to turn the tide of battle in unexpected ways.

Abilities

With a total of 8 unique ability cards, players are equipped with a variety of strategic options that allow them to quickly escape sticky situations or cleverly put their opponents in a difficult spot.

Maps

Engage in epic battles across nine uniquely designed battlefields. Venture into the frozen expanse of the icy tundra; clash in the eerie silence of a dusty, abandoned library; or face the heat and danger of a molten volcano. Each battlefield immerses you in a new world, forcing you to adapt your strategy and conquer diverse environments to claim victory.

Special 

The five chaotic cards are game-changers in every sense, introducing twists and turns that no one sees coming. Whether you’re on the winning side or mounting a comeback, these cards ensure that no match is ever truly decided until the very end.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac 13 or More Recent
  • Processor: Both Apple Silicon(M1 or Higher) or Intel(2.0 Ghz or Higher)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete video card
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Modern Sound Card

name: What The Chuck?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz or Higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete video card
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Modern Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Jump, Dodge and Chuck your way through a variety of battlefields in this local platforming multiplayer game. Play with two to four players in a chaotic and cartoony free-for-all. Prove yourself as the ultimate woodchuck warrior and crush your friends' dream of achieving gold!
